title: Falcons meltdown in Philly, NFL Week 1 Picks Against the Spread (Football 09/07)
description:
A very angry Will Brinson is joined by John Breech to break down the Eagles and Falcons game, which somehow ended in the Falcons losing the exact same way they lost in the playoffs, largely thanks to Steve Sarkisian's failures as a red zone play caller and Matt Ryan's struggles passing the ball. Then Will is joined by Nick Kostos and Pete Prisco to pick every game against the spread, including their five best bets for the SuperContest.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: John Breech joins Will Brinson to discuss the Falcons-Eagles game before Pete Prisco and Nick Kostos join the show to pick every game for week 1 against the spread.
